description: Structured information describing a subject that was studied.

name.description: User defined identifier of this subject.

species.description: Links to the species of this subject.

ageCategory.description: Links to the age category of this subject.

age.description: Chronological age of the subject at the time it was studied.

sex.description: Links to the biological sex of this subject.

genotype.description: Heritable genetic identity of this subject.

strain.description: Low-level taxonomy rank used to differentiate between similar organisms within a species.

weight.description: Body weight of the subject at the time it was studied.

samples.description: Link to all samples that were extracted from this subject.
